mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_id, user_name, user_birth, user_phone, user_regdate FROM user_tb WHERE user_out = 0 ORDER BY user_regdate DESC
SELECT user_no, user_id, user_name, user_birth, user_phone, user_regdate, user_outdate FROM user_tb WHERE user_out = 1 ORDER BY user_regdate DESC

WITH TEMP_DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(MIN(user_regdate), 'MM') AS MIN_DATE, TRUNC(MAX(user_regdate), 'MM') AS MAX_DATE FROM user_tb UNION ALL SELECT TRUNC(MIN(user_outdate), 'MM') AS MIN_DATE, TRUNC(MAX(user_outdate), 'MM') AS MAX_DATE FROM user_tb WHERE user_out = 1 ), DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(MIN(MIN_DATE)) AS MIN_DATE, TRUNC(MAX(MAX_DATE), 'MM') AS MAX_DATE FROM TEMP_DATES ), DATE_RANGE AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MIN_DATE, 'yyyy')||'01', 'yyyy-MM') - 1 + LEVEL AS THE_DATE FROM DATES CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MAX_DATE, 'yyyy')||'12', 'yyyy-MM') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MIN_DATE, 'yyyy')||'01', 'yyyy-MM') + 1 ) SELECT TO_CHAR(THE_DATE, 'YY-MM') AS MONTH, SUM(CASE WHEN user_regdate IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(user_regdate, 'MM') =THE_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REGISTERED_USERS, SUM(CASE WHEN user_outdate IS NOT NULL AND user_out = 1 AND TRUNC(user_outdate, 'MM') = THE_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REGOUTED_USERS FROM DATE_RANGE LEFT JOIN user_tb ON (TRUNC(user_regdate, 'MM') = THE_DATE OR TRUNC(user_outdate, 'MM') = THE_DATE) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(THE_DATE, 'YY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(THE_DATE, 'YY-MM')
